pkgmetadata.longdescription: # countach![Tests](https://github.com/HWRacing/countach/actions/workflows/tests.yml/badge.svg)A library for extracting data from A2L files generated by Ecocoder for the EV2274A. Information on usage is located [here](docs/usage.md), and other documentation is linked below:- [Characteristics](docs/characteristic.md)- [Measurements](docs/measurement.md)- [Types](docs/types.md)- [Fixed-Point Types](docs/fixed.md)## DisclaimerThis package will probably not work with anything other than the EV2274A and the Ecocoder library. This is by design - it's far easier for us to build something that just suits our needs instead of trawling through A2L standards and implementing a proper parser.
